title: Plain Text Filter Filter
description: Configuration for the Okapi Plain Text Filter Filter

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim Trail)
configurations.description: Text files; trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Trim All)
configurations.description: Text files; leading and trailing spaces and tabs removed from extracted lines.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Paragraphs)
configurations.description: Text files extracted by paragraphs (separated by 1 or more empty lines).

configurations.name: Spliced Lines (Backslash)
configurations.description: Spliced lines filter with the backslash character (\) used as the splicer.

configurations.name: Spliced Lines (Underscore)
configurations.description: Spliced lines filter with the underscore character (_) used as the splicer.

configurations.name: Spliced Lines (Custom)
configurations.description: Spliced lines filter with a user-defined splicer.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Regex, Line=Paragraph)
configurations.description: Plain Text Filter using regex-based linebreak search. Extracts by lines.

configurations.name: Plain Text (Regex, Block=Paragraph)
configurations.description: Plain Text Filter using regex-based linebreak search. Extracts by paragraphs.

simplifierRules.description: Simplifier rules for code type normalization
